description.en: Son of Śiva of Karnataka called Haripaṇḍita subsequently known by the name Śrī Pūrṇabodha (after initiation) held the preceptorship of the Pīṭha (Jagatgurupada) for twenty-six years. This realised preceptor merged in his illustrious effulgence in the early hours on the trayodaśī of Kṛṣṇapakṣa in the month Bhādrapada of the year Pramāthī.

shlokas:
kArNATO haripaNDitaH zivasutaH zrIpUrNabOdhAkhyayA bibhrANO'nupadaM jagadgurupadaM varSAMzca SaDviMzatim.
dhAmni svE paramE jagAma nilayaM varSE pramAthyAhvayE kRSNaprauSThapadatrayOdazatithau brAhmE kSaNE brahmavit..87..
—puNyazlOkamaJjarI
